scripts.dev: export UCLEARN_DEBUG=1 && run-s clean:dev dev:static dev:watchers
scripts.dev:static: cmd /C "mklink /J build src\static & mklink /J build\learn\highlight.js node_modules\highlight.js\styles & mklink /J build\learn\mathlive node_modules\mathlive\dist\fonts" && ls build/learn/python-typeshed.zip || (cd node_modules/typeshed && bestzip ../../build/learn/python-typeshed.zip ./stdlib/* ./stubs/* ./LICENSE --level 0 && cd ../..)
scripts.dev:watchers: run-p -r -l dev:learn dev:hydration-worker dev:timetable dev:css-watcher dev:reload-watcher-server
scripts.dev:css-watcher: bun onchange -i src/css/*.css -- bun run dev:css
scripts.dev:css: lightningcss --bundle src/css/learn.css -o build/learn/index.css && lightningcss --bundle src/css/ace-code-shadow.css -o build/learn/ace-code-shadow.css && lightningcss --bundle src/css/timetable.css -o build/timetable/index.css
scripts.build: export UCLEARN_DEBUG=0 UCLEARN_DEBUG_FLAGS= && run-s clean:dev clean:build bundle build:learn build:hydration-worker build:timetable build:css
scripts.build:css: lightningcss --minify --bundle src/css/learn.css -o dist/learn/index.css && lightningcss --minify --bundle src/css/ace-code-shadow.css -o dist/learn/ace-code-shadow.css && lightningcss --minify --bundle src/css/timetable.css -o dist/timetable/index.css
scripts.bundle: mkdir dist && cp -R src/static/* dist && rm dist/manifest.json dist/fonts/noto-color-emoji/NotoColorEmoji-Regular.ttf dist/**/dev-* && mkdir dist/learn/mathlive && cmd /C "xcopy /S node_modules\mathlive\dist\fonts dist\learn\mathlive" && mv dist/manifest.production.json dist/manifest.json && (cd node_modules/typeshed && bestzip ../../dist/learn/python-typeshed.zip ./stdlib/* ./stubs/* ./LICENSE --level 9 && cd ../..)
scripts.clean:dev: (rm -r -f src/static/learn/index.js src/static/learn/hydration-worker.js src/static/learn/index.css src/static/timetable/index.js src/static/timetable/index.css src/static/learn/ace-code-shadow.css || true) && cmd /C "rd src\static\learn\highlight.js & rd src\static\learn\mathlive & rd build" || true
